description: Product of the orders of the elements in a cyclic group with n elements.
formula: a(n) = Product_{ d divides n } d^phi(d). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 10 2004
maple: a:=n->mul(denom (k/n), k=1..n): seq(a(n), n=1..18); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 26 2008
author: Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 10 2002
